name: PIGGE
description:
Controls:

Keyboard and Mouse

  • WASD - Movement
  • Space Bar - Jump
  • CTRL - Crouch
  • E - Interact
  • Esc - Pause

XBOX Controller

  • Left Analog Stick - Movement
  • A - Jump
  • B - Crouch
  • X - Interact
  • Start - Pause
Team:
  • Rita Macedo
  • Francisco Domingues
  • Rui Barata
  • André Loureiro

This prototype of our game is meant to be played at a resolution of 1920x1080.

Enjoy! oink oink~
